PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-13282024-12-16NRCAN
ActCanadian Energy Regulator Act
SubjectCanada Offshore Renewable Energy Regulations
PrecisCANADA OFFSHORE RENEWABLE ENERGY REGULATIONS in order to operationalize Part 5 of the Canadian Energy Regulator Act by establishing comprehensive requirements respecting work and activities related to offshore renewable energy projects and offshore power lines for the purposes of safety, security, and environmental protection.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0272 Publication Date: 2025-01-01
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: CANADA OFFSHORE RENEWABLE ENERGY REGULATIONS  in order to operationalize Part 5 of the Canadian Energy Regulator Act by establishing comprehensive requirements respecting work and activities related to offshore renewable energy projects and offshore power lines for the purposes of safety, security, and environmental protection.
